CHAT.comment: Looking at books the children choose , telling stories , playing with soft toys , playing in front of the camera and looking at a photo album which shows pictures of the children and their families.
This file is the fourth of a series of six (a to f) for the same session. Lucille and Victor are playing in front of the camera. Three children join in: Eliza , Carla , and Sara.
Room next to classroom where the children have their afternoon nap. A table and chairs are added for our sessions.
